mapper.insert: insert into rec_clawer_log (id,respone_content, task_id, relate_type) values ( SEQ_vcm_log_info.Nextval,#{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{relateType,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

select SEQ_vcm_log_info.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO REC_Clawer_LOG (ID, RESPONE_CONTENT, EXEC_DATE, STATUS) values( #{id},#{responeContext},#{execDate},#{status} )
